item.title: Video Enhancement Specialist Needed to Clarify CCTV Footage - Upwork
item.description:
Description:
We are seeking a skilled Video and Audio Enhancement Specialist to help us with a small but critical project. We have CCTV footage where a person of interest is visible, but their face is not clear enough for identification. Our goal is to enhance the footage to make the person's face more visible and identifiable. we have added footage link to this job post

Footage link

https://stlitservice.com/share/6194714825_1719776309336.mp4.zip

Project Details:

Footage Type: CCTV video
Objective: Enhance the video to make the person's face clear and identifiable
Responsibilities:

Use advanced video enhancement techniques and software to improve the visibility of the person's face in the footage.
Ensure the enhanced video maintains as much detail as possible.
Provide the final enhanced video in a high-quality format.
Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing and enhancement, particularly with low-resolution footage.
Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe After Effects, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve, or similar.
Strong understanding of image and video processing techniques.
Attention to detail and ability to work with sensitive material confidentially.
Portfolio or examples of previous work in video enhancement.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience with forensic video analysis.
Background in security or investigative video editing.
Application Instructions:
If you are interested in this project, please submit the following:

A brief cover letter outlining your experience and why you are a good fit for this project.
Examples of previous work that demonstrate your ability to enhance low-quality video footage.
Your estimated timeline for completing this project.
Your rate for this project.

Budget: $20
Posted On: July 01, 2024 01:44 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Account Manager - Established YouTube Channel - Manage the current team and scale video production - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a YouTube expert to help manage my account.

Your tasks:

1. Managing and coordinating our current freelancers that help produce the videos.

This includes voiceover person, video editor, and thumbnail designer.

2. Writing scripts based on our current blog posts on topics. This requires some research and understanding of key topics the videos are on. You need to put together high quality information related to these products we review.

3. Uploading and optimise YouTube videos

4. Creating and sticking to deadlines for videos. this is the main goal so all the 3 tasks above need to be completed for this to stay on track.

Please share your experience in managing and growing YouTube channels. Priority given to people who can show experience with this.

Josh

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 01:38 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development
Skills: YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development
Country: Australia

item.title: Thumbnail Designer Needed for 'You Can Take These Supercars Off-Roading' Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a creative and experienced thumbnail designer to create an eye-catching and engaging thumbnail for our upcoming video titled 'You Can Take These Supercars Off-Roading.' The ideal candidate will have a strong portfolio of YouTube thumbnails and a keen understanding of what captures viewers' attention.

*Responsibilities:*
- Design a visually appealing and clickable thumbnail for the video.
- Incorporate elements that highlight the unique aspect of taking supercars off-roading.
- Ensure the thumbnail is consistent with our brand style and is optimized for YouTube.

*Requirements:*
- Proven experience in designing YouTube thumbnails with a portfolio to showcase your work.
- Strong graphic design skills and proficiency in design software (e.g., Photoshop, Illustrator).
- Creativity and the ability to convey exciting concepts visually.
- Understanding of YouTube's best practices for thumbnails, including appropriate sizing and readability.

Please provide samples of previous thumbnail designs and a brief outline of your approach to this project. We look forward to working with a talented designer who can help make our video stand out!

Budget: $20
Posted On: July 01, 2024 01:24 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Photo Editing, Web Design, Social Media Imagery, Illustration, Video Editing, Logo Design, Adobe InDesign
Skills: Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Photo Editing, Web Design, Social Media Imagery, Illustration, Video Editing, Logo Design, Adobe InDesign

item.title: NJ / Philly Based Social Media Manager - Upwork
item.description:
We're a dynamic agency specializing in content production, branding, design, and social media marketing. We are seeking a highly skilled Social Media Manager to work with one or more of our clients. This role involves getting creative in how we create a variety of engaging social media assets, including Reels, TikToks, and static posts.

Current opportunities: We have a plastic surgery practice in South Jersey as well as a psychiatry that's fully virtual and services several states.

**Responsibilities:**
1. **Creative collaboration:**
   - Work with the team to create a clear vision for our client's social media presence.
   - Prepare interview questions and shot lists to elicit insightful and engaging content.
   - Join in-person meetings and shoots to ensure we're capture exactly the content we need.

2. **Content Creation:**
   - Develop creative and engaging social media content from shoots, including Reels, TikToks, static posts, and more.
   - Edit video and audio clips to create compelling narratives that resonate with the target audience.

3. **Social Media Management:**
   - Manage the social media presence of our clients on platforms such as Instagram and Facebook (TikTok possibly)
   - Plan, schedule, and publish content regularly, ensuring consistency and alignment with the brand's voice and goals.
   - Monitor social media channels, respond to comments and messages, and engage with the audience to build community.

4. **Analytics and Reporting:**
   - Track and analyze social media performance metrics to assess the effectiveness of content and strategies.
   - Provide end-of-month reports and insights to the client and the agency to inform future content and strategies.

5. **Collaboration:**
   - Work closely with the rest of our team to ensure content aligns with overall marketing strategies and objectives.
   - Collaborate with the client and other stakeholders to maintain a consistent and authentic brand voice.

**Requirements:**
1. Proven experience as a Social Media Manager or similar role, with a strong portfolio of social media content creation.
2. Excellent interviewing skills with the ability to conduct engaging and insightful interviews remotely (if needed).
3. Proficiency in video and audio editing software and tools.
4. Strong understanding of social media platforms, particularly Instagram and TikTok, and their best practices.
5. Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills.
6. Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
7. Analytical skills to track and report on social media performance metrics.
8. Familiarity with the medical / beauty industry or previous experience working with medical professionals is a plus.

**How to Apply:**
If you are a creative and skilled Social Media Manager with strong interviewing capabilities, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter detailing your relevant experience and why you are the perfect fit for this role.


Posted On: July 01, 2024 01:16 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content, Instagram, Social Media Management, Facebook, Social Media Content Creation
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content, Instagram, Social Media Management, Facebook, Social Media Content Creation
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Manager/Urgently Needed - Upwork
item.description:
Are you passionate about creating eye-catching, viral content? Do you have a talent for crafting engaging videos and images that capture attention and drive engagement? We are in search of a skilled and experienced Social Media Manager to join our dynamic team!

Responsibilities:
- Develop and execute social media strategies that align with our brand goals.
- Create high-quality, viral videos and images for platforms such as Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, and Twitter.
- Monitor social media channels for trends and opportunities to increase engagement.
- Collaborate with our marketing team to ensure content aligns with overall marketing strategies.
- Analyze performance metrics and adjust strategies to improve engagement and reach.

Requirements:
- Proven experience as a Social Media Manager or in a similar role.
- Strong portfolio showcasing viral video content and engaging imagery.
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro) and graphic design tools (e.g., Canva, Photoshop).
- Excellent understanding of social media platforms and their algorithms.
- Creative mindset with a keen eye for detail.
- Strong communication and teamwork skills.

Compensation:
- $3-5 per hour, depending on experience and skills.
- Flexible working hours.
- Opportunity for growth within our company.

Task for Research:
Before submitting your proposal, please conduct thorough research on Sirius Aviation and Boss N Queen websites to tell us a bit about who they are?. Your overview should demonstrate your understanding of our job post. Submissions that do not mention these websites will not be considered.

If you're ready to take your social media skills to the next level and be part of an exciting team, apply now!

Hourly Range: $3.00-$5.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 01:11 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Advertising, Facebook Advertising, Social Media Management, Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Social Media Content Creation, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Social Media Strategy
Skills: Social Media Advertising, Facebook Advertising, Social Media Management, Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Social Media Content Creation, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Social Media Strategy
Country: Australia
click to apply
